solution_line_template: Troy has ${initial_savings} + ${old_computer_sale} = $<<{initial_savings}+{old_computer_sale}={total_money_saved}>>{total_money_saved} from his savings and the sales of his old computer.
Therefore, he still needs ${computer_cost} - ${total_money_saved} = $<<{computer_cost}-{total_money_saved}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} more to buy the new computer.
